  • Constructor Details

    • PriestAndPrincess

      PriestAndPrincess(PriestAndPrincess.Behaviour behaviour)
      Creates a new PriestAndPrincess card. If behaviour is PriestAndPrincess.Behaviour.PRIEST the card will act as a Priest card. Otherwise, it will act a Princess card.
      Parameters:
      behaviour - an enum describing what this card will act as

    • doPrepare

      Tuple<PreparePhase,Character> doPrepare(PreparePhase phase)
      PreparePhase hook. This implementation additionally requests maxStudentAmount of Student from the Sack. Subclasses should call this implementation if they want this behaviour.
      Overrides:
      doPrepare in class StudentStoreCharacter
      Parameters:
      phase - the PreparePhase the card's hook has been called from
      Returns:
      a Tuple containing the updated PreparePhase and the updated Character

    • doEffect

      Tuple<ActionPhase,Character> doEffect(ActionPhase phase, CharacterStep... steps) throws InvalidCharacterParameterException, InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      If acting as Priest: Pick one student from the card and place it on the Island at given index. The card uses 1 step. Parameters are the following:
      • card: color of the student to move from this card to the Island
      • island: island index on which to place the Student

      If acting as Princess: Pick one student from the card and place it on the current player's Hall. The card uses 1 step. Parameters are the following:

      • card: color of the student to move from this card to the Hall
      Overrides:
      doEffect in class Character
      Parameters:
      phase - the ActionPhase the card's effect has been called from
      steps - an array of CharacterStep configuring the effect
      Returns:
      a Tuple containing the updated ActionPhase and the updated Character
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if phase or steps or are null
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if any of the parameters in steps is formatted incorrectly
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException - if the effect of the card would modify the state in an illegal way

    • doPriest

    • fromSack

      private Tuple<ActionPhase,StudentStoreCharacter> fromSack(ActionPhase ap, StudentStoreCharacter character)
      To be fed to StudentStoreCharacter.moveFromHere(Tuple, PieceColor, ThrowingBiFunction, ThrowingBiFunction), puts a character from the sack onto the card
      Parameters:
      ap - the ActionPhase
      character - the StudentStoreCharacter where the card will be put
